snippet: As technology has become more unforgiving and players’ schedules more unrelenting, a cottage industry of pit crews employed to work on golfers’ bodies has taken root.
abstract: Brutal tour schedules and intensifying standards have taken strong toll on pro golfers' bodies, spawning cottage industry of pit crews who help ease their aches and pains on tour; treatments include chiropractics and yoga as players seek to fend off injury.
lead_paragraph: As technology has become more unforgiving and players’ schedules more unrelenting, a cottage industry of pit crews employed to work on golfers’ bodies has taken root.

headline.main: Golfers’ Will to Win Gets a Boost From Pit Crews for Aching Bodies
headline.print_headline: Will to Win Gets a Boost From Pit Crews for Aching Bodies
